languages.text: "Орудие Боли, созданное гемункулом — тончайший механизм, оркестр страданий и мук, снабженный тысячью игл, ножей и шприцов, дарующих высочайшие ощущения. Оно способно высосать твою душу, перемолоть ее, изменить навсегда... а затем возродить ее, вернув все эссенции и чувства обратно в твои жилы. Нет экстаза, что может сравниться в силе с тем, кто перенес пытку Орудием".

"This Engine of Pain created by a Haemonculus is a delicate mechanism — an orchestra of suffering and torment, equipped with a thousand needles, knives, and syringes that inflict the most sublime sensations. It will suck out your soul, grind it to dust, change it forever... and then revive it, restoring all essences and feelings to your veins. There is no ecstasy greater than that experienced by one who has endured this Engine's torture."
languages.original_text: "Орудие Боли, созданное гемункулом — тончайший механизм, оркестр страданий и мук, снабженный тысячью игл, ножей и шприцов, дарующих высочайшие ощущения. Оно способно высосать твою душу, перемолоть ее, изменить навсегда... а затем возродить ее, вернув все эссенции и чувства обратно в твои жилы. Нет экстаза, что может сравниться в силе с тем, кто перенес пытку Орудием".

It will suck out your soul, grind it to dust, change it forever... and then revive it, restoring all essences and feelings to your veins. There is no ecstasy greater than that experienced by one who has endured this Engine's torture."

languages.text: “这台痛苦引擎，是由血伶人制造的精密机械装置。它是痛苦与折磨的交响乐团，配备了数以千计的针头、小刀与注射器，可以带来至高无上的体验。它会吸走你的灵魂，将其碾成粉末，彻底改变它的样子……之后再将其复苏，让所有的精华与情感再次流淌在你的血管之中。没有任何感觉，能比这台痛苦引擎带来的折磨与狂喜更加美妙。”
languages.original_text: "This Engine of Pain created by a Haemonculus is a delicate mechanism — an orchestra of suffering and torment, equipped with a thousand needles, knives, and syringes that inflict the most sublime sensations. It will suck out your soul, grind it to dust, change it forever... and then revive it, restoring all essences and feelings to your veins. There is no ecstasy greater than that experienced by one who has endured this Engine's torture."

traits.locale_text: “这台痛苦引擎，是由血伶人制造的精密机械装置。它是痛苦与折磨的交响乐团，配备了数以千计的针头、小刀与注射器，可以带来至高无上的体验。它会吸走你的灵魂，将其碾成粉末，彻底改变它的样子……之后再将其复苏，让所有的精华与情感再次流淌在你的血管之中。没有任何感觉，能比这台痛苦引擎带来的折磨与狂喜更加美妙。”

languages.text: 「ハモンキュラスが生んだこのエンジン・オブ・ペインは繊細な動きをして、苦しみと痛みのオーケストラを奏でるーー搭載された千本針やナイフ、注射器で最高に高尚な快感を与えるんだ。魂を吸い取って、塵になるまですり潰し、永遠に変えてしまう…そして魂を復活させて、すべてのエキスと感情を血管に戻す。このエンジンの拷問に耐えた者が経験するエクスタシー以上のものは他にはない」
languages.original_text: "This Engine of Pain created by a Haemonculus is a delicate mechanism — an orchestra of suffering and torment, equipped with a thousand needles, knives, and syringes that inflict the most sublime sensations. It will suck out your soul, grind it to dust, change it forever... and then revive it, restoring all essences and feelings to your veins. There is no ecstasy greater than that experienced by one who has endured this Engine's torture."

traits.locale_text: 「ハモンキュラスが生んだこのエンジン・オブ・ペインは繊細な動きをして、苦しみと痛みのオーケストラを奏でるーー搭載された千本針やナイフ、注射器で最高に高尚な快感を与えるんだ。魂を吸い取って、塵になるまですり潰し、永遠に変えてしまう…そして魂を復活させて、すべてのエキスと感情を血管に戻す。このエンジンの拷問に耐えた者が経験するエクスタシー以上のものは他にはない」

languages.text: «Este Motor del Dolor creado por un hemónculo es un mecanismo delicado, una orquesta de sufrimiento y tormento provista de un millar de agujas, cuchillas y jeringas que infligen las sensaciones más sublimes. Te absorberá el alma, la molerá hasta reducirla a polvo, la cambiará para siempre... y luego la revivirá, restableciendo todas las esencias y sensaciones de tus venas. No existe mayor éxtasis que el experimentado por quienes se someten a la tortura de este dispositivo».
languages.original_text: "This Engine of Pain created by a Haemonculus is a delicate mechanism — an orchestra of suffering and torment, equipped with a thousand needles, knives, and syringes that inflict the most sublime sensations. It will suck out your soul, grind it to dust, change it forever... and then revive it, restoring all essences and feelings to your veins. There is no ecstasy greater than that experienced by one who has endured this Engine's torture."

traits.locale_text: «Este Motor del Dolor creado por un hemónculo es un mecanismo delicado, una orquesta de sufrimiento y tormento provista de un millar de agujas, cuchillas y jeringas que infligen las sensaciones más sublimes. Te absorberá el alma, la molerá hasta reducirla a polvo, la cambiará para siempre... y luego la revivirá, restableciendo todas las esencias y sensaciones de tus venas. No existe mayor éxtasis que el experimentado por quienes se someten a la tortura de este dispositivo».

languages.text: « Cette machine de tourment conçue par un hémoncule est un mécanisme particulièrement sophistiqué : un véritable orchestre de souffrance et de torture bardé d'un millier d'aiguilles, de scalpels et de seringues infligeant les sensations les plus grisantes qui soient. Elle aspirera votre âme et la réduira en poussière, l'altérant à jamais... avant de la ranimer pour mieux réinjecter dans vos veines toutes ces essences et émotions mêlées. Se soumettre au supplice de cet engin, c'est toucher du doigt l'extase suprême. »
languages.original_text: "This Engine of Pain created by a Haemonculus is a delicate mechanism — an orchestra of suffering and torment, equipped with a thousand needles, knives, and syringes that inflict the most sublime sensations. It will suck out your soul, grind it to dust, change it forever... and then revive it, restoring all essences and feelings to your veins. There is no ecstasy greater than that experienced by one who has endured this Engine's torture."

traits.locale_text: « Cette machine de tourment conçue par un hémoncule est un mécanisme particulièrement sophistiqué : un véritable orchestre de souffrance et de torture bardé d'un millier d'aiguilles, de scalpels et de seringues infligeant les sensations les plus grisantes qui soient. Elle aspirera votre âme et la réduira en poussière, l'altérant à jamais... avant de la ranimer pour mieux réinjecter dans vos veines toutes ces essences et émotions mêlées. Se soumettre au supplice de cet engin, c'est toucher du doigt l'extase suprême. »

languages.text: "Diese von einem Haemonculus entwickelte Schmerzmaschine ist ein fragiler Mechanismus – sie liefert ein Orchester des Leids und der Qual und verfügt über tausend Nadeln, Messern und Spritzen, die allesamt die erhabensten Empfindungen hervorrufen. Sie wird Euch die Seele aus dem Leib saugen, sie zu Staub zermalmen und sie für immer verändern ... dann belebt sie sie wieder, indem sie alle Essenzen und Gefühle zurück in die Adern bringt. Nur wer die Qualen dieser Maschine erträgt wird diese höchste Ekstase erreichen."
languages.original_text: "This Engine of Pain created by a Haemonculus is a delicate mechanism — an orchestra of suffering and torment, equipped with a thousand needles, knives, and syringes that inflict the most sublime sensations. It will suck out your soul, grind it to dust, change it forever... and then revive it, restoring all essences and feelings to your veins. There is no ecstasy greater than that experienced by one who has endured this Engine's torture."

traits.locale_text: "Diese von einem Haemonculus entwickelte Schmerzmaschine ist ein fragiler Mechanismus – sie liefert ein Orchester des Leids und der Qual und verfügt über tausend Nadeln, Messern und Spritzen, die allesamt die erhabensten Empfindungen hervorrufen. Nur wer die Qualen dieser Maschine erträgt wird diese höchste Ekstase erreichen."

languages.text: "Haimonkulus'un ürettiği bu Acı Motoru, hassas bir mekanizmadır. En muazzam hisleri tattıracak binlerce iğneyle, bıçakla ve şırıngayla donatılmış, acı ve eziyet dolu bir orkestradır. Ruhunu boşaltacak, toza çevirecek, ebediyen değiştirecek ve... Ardından diriltip tüm özünü ve damarlarındaki tüm hisleri geri kazandıracak. Bu Motor'un işkencesine dayanabilen birinin deneyimlediği kadar harika bir haz düşünülemez."
languages.original_text: "This Engine of Pain created by a Haemonculus is a delicate mechanism — an orchestra of suffering and torment, equipped with a thousand needles, knives, and syringes that inflict the most sublime sensations. It will suck out your soul, grind it to dust, change it forever... and then revive it, restoring all essences and feelings to your veins. There is no ecstasy greater than that experienced by one who has endured this Engine's torture."
